name: Mercenary Pilot
Lore: 'Smugglers. Candidates who resent authority often abandon Imperial academies to sell their piloting skills to criminals. Will work for any high paying crime syndicate.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots or drives. When driving a transport vehicle, adds one battle destiny. When piloting at a cloud sector, once per turn adds one battle destiny during battle at a related exterior site.',
